snippet: The Reds had not stolen that many bases in an inning since at least the 1920s, according to Elias Sports Bureau.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Cincinnati Reds beat Colorado Rockies, 4-3; other pro baseball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Reds had not stolen that many bases in an inning since at least the 1920s, according to Elias Sports Bureau.

headline.print_headline: Five Steals in One Inning Carry Reds Over Rockies
headline.main: Five Steals in One Inning Carry Reds Over Rockies
